page.title: 08Police Sharlston/Crofton
page.content: Sharlston and Crofton are policed by 3 community policemen. They are based in an office at Crofton but the nearest police station is at Normanton. The policemen walk or bicycle around but can call 2 cars as back up. Our local policemen trained at Harrogate. P.C. Goulding, one of the local men, has been a policeman for 12 years. He works 56 hours a week with 1 weekend a month off duty. He works shifts 6 a.m. - 2 p.m. or 2 p.m. - 10 p.m. or 10 p.m. - 6 a.m. The crime he most often has to deal with is vandalism. In our area there is also a police driving school. There, policemen are taught to drive to a higher standard as well as to drive all sorts of police vehicles.
